name: Prototype breakout RPG
description:
Public ALPHA is now OPEN.

Kitsune Lab will like to present to you a prototype game.

I have taken the concept of the breakout game and turned it into an RPG. The basic story is the player is a Psyonist that uses psychic powers to fight enemies in their mind-scape. The story is a work in progress and is not present in this prototype engine.

The purpose is to use the mouse (On PC) or you can tilt (Android phones.) to control a paddle. Your aim is to bounce the energy ball around to collect energy to attack with. You have a chance to collect ability shards to learn new elemental attacks.

Each map is procedurally generated so you get a random map every time. 

Created using GameMakerStudio 2.3

EXE file is untested on other types of window products.

APK should be compatible with android 7 and above.

Please note: This is a PROTOTYPE. There are many bugs present and the game is incomplete. Only the first level is implemented. art is NOT final. it is just placeholder art as I program.

Known bugs: Collision is not perfect and there is code in place to reset the ball position if the ball becomes 'stuck'.

Please note any bugs and consider donating to help this project to grow.

Many features set for updates. Please leave any positive and helpful feedback.

Update log:

7/2/21 Prototype 0002 released for public testing.
